wrot=
e:
> 
> How do you receive your complaints?
>

We put our crawler "signatur=
e" in Heritrix when we crawl the Internet. 
The signature is specified in t=
he order.xml file. Heritrix, as a user 
agent, will leave that signiture on=
 the crawled site.

The signature is in the form of a URL so people know wh=
ere they can 
contact us.

Most of the time, people use email. There are ra=
re cases where people 
use formal letters to address their concerns.
